Calendar

When will Eventos.UA can be used by public?

Project’s RoadMap

The Eventos.UA project’s roadmap is depicted in the figure below:

Milestones and Deadlines

The table below shows what will be done at Eventos.UA project in every milestone:

Milestone 1
  • Project vision
  • Present the project calendar
  • Understand the systems’ architecture
 23/03/2021
Milestone 2
  • Have a basic version of the web App and communication system
  • Start mobile app development
 13/04/2021
Milestone 3
  • Additional features both on the WebApp and mobile app
 18/05/2021
Milestone 4
  • Both the WebApp and the mobile app should be ready to be released
 15/06/2021

Calendar

The table below shows what was done at Eventos.UA project in every week:

Week 1
  • First meeting
  • Project choice
  • Get envolved with the environment and scoop of the project
 8th March - 15th March
Week 2
  • Project validation
  • First Milestone discussion
  • Research about the tools and languages used
 16th March - 21st March
Week 3
  • Project calendarization
  • Lifecycle objectives
  • Withdrawal of problems in the WebApp
 22nd March - 28th March
Week 4
  • Start of development of the mobile App
  • Fix most crucial issues
  • Layout change to UA's theme
 29th March - 4th April
Week 5
  • WebApp restructuring
  • Verification of API's calls existing
  • MobileApp development continuation
 5th April - 11th April
Week 6
  • App desing and scope
  • Frontend work
  • MobileApp development continuation - Alpha production
 12th April - 18th April
Week 7
  • App development
  • WebApp polish
  • MobileApp Alpha delivery
 19th April - 25th April
Week 8
  • App development
  • WebApp polish
  • MobileApp development continuation - Beta production
 26th April - 2nd May
Week 9
  • App development
  • WebApp polish
  • MobileApp Beta delivery
 3rd May - 9th May

For more information about the Milestones and their Deliverables, check out our documentation area.
